widget.name: Keyboard Shortcut
widget.description: Trigger an action if a certain combination of keys is pressed

property.caption: Action
property.description: Action that will be called when the key (combination) is pressed.

property.caption: Show progress bar
property.description: Whether or not to show a blocking progress bar.

property.caption: Code
property.description: Code of the key that is triggered, can be found on e.g. https://keycode.info/, make sure you use event.code (a is KeyA)

property.caption: Alt key
property.description: Only trigger event when alt key is pressed.

property.caption: Ctrl key
property.description: Only trigger event when ctrl key is pressed.

property.caption: Shift key
property.description: Only trigger event when shift key is pressed.

property.caption: Disable on input focus
property.description: Whether or not to disable the keyboard shortcut when an input field is focussed.

property.caption: Disable on popup open
property.description: Whether or not to disable the keyboard shortcut when a popup is open (checks whether class '.modal-dialog' is found on the page).
